meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1085.

td.p: Tom Callan, an optometrist from Walnut Creek, California
Bruce Cox, an analyst from Lakeside, California
Phyllis Massengale, an accountant from San Antonio, Texas (whose 1-day cash winnings total $5,900)

tr.td: GOVERNMENT
JEWELRY
SPORTS
SINGERS' REAL NAMES
FICTIONAL CHARACTERS
5-LETTER WORDS

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
